item.title: Basic Properties of the Derivative

ewcommand{\Mee}[9]{ egin{bmatrix} #1 & #2 & #3  r #4 & #5 & #6  r #7 & #8 & #9 \end{bmatrix}}$ Definition: Differentiability & Derivative Let $f $ be a real-valued function defined on an open interval containing a point $a $.

ewcommand{\Mee}[9]{ egin{bmatrix} #1 & #2 & #3  r #4 & #5 & #6  r #7 & #8 & #9 \end{bmatrix}}$ Definition: Diagonalizability of Linear Operators Let $T$ be an linear operator on a finite-dimensional vector space $V$,
